{"title": "SunAge", "title_search": "sunage", "title_keyword": "sunage", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/sunage/", "summary": "SunAge is a real-time strategy game where the player can experience immersive gameplay with 3 different races, each with their own arsenal of units, buildings and upgrades. With Earth teetering on the brink of extinction, human Federals and mutant-gene Raak-Zun are battling for control of its dwindling resources. Then, into this savage conflict step the mysterious Sentinel, exploiting superior technology that opens gateways to an alien and resource-rich planet. An epic clash is set to unfold, and along with it the mystery of a sinister creature that lurks at the very heart of their troubles. {"title": "Pet Vet 3D: Animal Hospital", "title_search": "pet vet 3d animal hospital", "title_keyword": "pet vet 3d animal hospital", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/pet-vet-3d-animal-hospital/", "summary": "Calling all animal lovers! Have tons of fun running your very own pet vet clinic. As a doctor you'll get to take care of fuzzy bunnies, adorable cats, dogs, horses, ponies and even piglets. Packed with oodles of awesome activities ranging from animal examinations, dog training and even horse back riding; you'll learn amazing facts about animals while you treat, care, and love them. You will be given opportunities to run and operate your own animal hospital with your very own staff. Which will let you examine various animals and find out what's wrong, also the tools and knowledge to be able to diagnose the problems of your patient and then finally be able to cure them of their sickness. You will even be able to go shopping to pick up yummy foods, pet toys, and vet supplies. Most importantly you will be able to develop relationships with your patients by showing love, affection during playtime. {"title": "Legend: Hand of God", "title_search": "legend hand of god", "title_keyword": "legend hand of god", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/legend-hand-of-god/", "summary": "(Currently available in the UK/EU only)  Whether large or small, the main difference between enemies in modern action-oriented RPGs has always just been the number of their hitpoints. Legend \u2013 Hand of God, the new action RPG by dtp entertainment and Master Creating breaks with this tradition, setting new standards. Thanks to the innovative Cinematic Combat System, orcs, ogres, trolls, goblins and their ilk will all be fought heroically in their own right. The Cinematic Combat System makes every monster brawl special. In Legend, gamers won't use their sword to tickle giant enemies at the knees anymore, but will fight them in a challenging and realistic manner \u2013 and in beautiful, spectacular 3D graphics. At the same time, Legend \u2013 Hand of God remains just as easy to control as other action RPGs. The impressive graphics are provided by an in-house engine, tailored specifically for the needs of an action RPG. Randomly generated dungeons and a manually crafted world on the surface bring the fantasy universe of Legend \u2013 Hand of God to life. A luminous spirit accompanies the players, giving them tips and clues, serving as the cursor and \u2013 thanks to real-time lighting \u2013 illuminating the dark corners of the world.", "genre": ["RPG"], "metascore": "57", "critic_reviews": 9, "user_score": "5.3", "user_reviews": 15, "release_date": "2008-08-01", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/3/6-1-78560-13.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-78561-52.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": "Mixed or average", "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["Europe", "Australia", "North America"], "companies": ["Master Creating (Developer)", "ValuSoft (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["PC"], "rating": "M"}

{"title": "DJ Hero", "title_search": "dj hero", "title_keyword": "dj hero", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/dj-hero/", "summary": "DJ Hero drops the needle with a completely fresh experience and legendary artists including Black Eyed Peas, 50 Cent, Justice, Marvin Gaye, Beck, Beastie Boys and N.E.R.D. DJ Hero features more than 100 individual songs that have been transformed into more than 80 exclusive, original mixes by superstar DJs including DJ Shadow, DJ Z-Trip, DJ AM, and the legendary Grandmaster Flash. With an innovative, new turntable controller and the hottest music collection of original music, DJ Hero is a unique new social music gaming experience that excite the millions of dance club music fans who can now play along to hit songs from a range of genres including hip-hop, R&B, pop, rock and electronica allowing them to rule the party with original mixes. Joining the internationally acclaimed DJ, producer and recording artist DJ Shadow, who has been consulting and contributed several mixes for DJ Hero, and making their video game debuts, DJ Z-Trip, a founder of the mashup movement who\u2019s known worldwide for his sold out shows and eclectic style, and DJ AM, one of the world\u2019s premier and most in-demand DJs today, appear as in-game characters and have each created multiple exclusive mixes for DJ Hero. In DJ Hero, faces in the crowd are transformed into the life of the party as the game\u2019s turntable controller - created exclusively for DJ Hero and featuring familiar DJ tools including a fully-rotating turntable, sample buttons, effects dial and cross fader - immerses fans into the authenticity of DJ culture and a sea of music. By utilizing and mastering various DJ techniques including scratching, blending, cross fading and sampling, while leaving room for creative expression with a variety of effects and player chosen samples and scratches, gamers rule the party performing music as only a DJ can. Social expression is heightened with euphoric multiplayer gameplay where two DJs can battle competitively or have a player join in to emcee over any track in the game with a mic. Additionally, gamers can rock together as DJ Hero features DJ-guitar exclusive mixes played with a turntable controller and Guitar Hero guitar controller. {"title": "Moskila", "title_search": "moskila", "title_keyword": "moskila", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/moskila/", "summary": "You are the Dracula (or Vampire) hungry for blood. Be a nimble mosquito and get to her in secret. No plenty time. Your life will be threatened by flyflap and repellent when they sense you are coming. Better avoid annoying insects hanging around you. Drink! Feel the power of red blood! You will rule the bloody World that you've been dreaming. Moskila is a game that you fly by heading off the collision in air and land the right spot to get blood as much as you can. As iPod slants, Mosquito has a free flying. Touch the spot where blood is and then you land and start to suck the blood. The game will end when you get the target amount of blood in given time. If you slip in landing, flyflap hits you in blink of an eye. The game will also end when you used all HP. When you clear the 1st round, you can purchase defensive items at the shop. The Items are Helmet for collision with other insects, gas mask for repellent and armor for flyflap. You don't need to activate those defensive items since it be activated automatically when having attack. Each item can be used in 3 times. The indication of bloodsucking is divided into 3 types such as large, medium and small. The smaller, more blood. If you touch the screen any time during sucking, you can fly up to air immediately. If you succeed in bloodsucking many times, you will get warning by human face coming up. Be careful with repellent spay attack unless you keep away from it. As stage up, more obstacles. You can select the difficulty at the beginning. We recommend easy mode for beginner and ultra mode for expert. You can save 3 different games that you've been playing. Give one save for your friend with your charity. *************************************** Bonus-Anti Mosquito supply Anti-mos is an that lets you get rid of mosquitoes. *************************************** Play moive http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oFdgvbxOni4 ***************************************", "genre": ["Action"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2009-09-03", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-126704-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-126704-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["ICECREAM SOFT (Developer)", "ICECREAM SOFT (Publisher)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "Monster Trucks Mayhem", "title_search": "monster trucks mayhem", "title_keyword": "monster trucks mayhem", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/monster-trucks-mayhem/", "summary": "Strap yourself in because it's time for some Monster Trucks Mayhem!  Enormous tires, incredibly powerful engines, and the shocking excitement of monster truck racing has come exclusively to Wii! {"title": "Amazon Survival", "title_search": "amazon survival", "title_keyword": "amazon survival", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/amazon-survival/", "summary": "AMAZON SURVIVAL Welcome to the jungle! With over 50 million game plays on the web in 3 months this is an online classic in a portable format brought to you by the worlds biggest skill games community - King.com. Amazon Survival is played in the deep rain forest surrounding the Amazon river. Your goal is to bring the blocks down so they are all beneath the surface. Save animals by bringing them down to the water for extra points. Enjoy the classic Time Attack mode and the all new Survival mode for more fun ways to enjoy this great puzzle game. GAME RULES Drop blocks to make groups of 4 or more of one colour in order to remove all blocks above the surface. You will move on to the next level when all blocks and animals are below the water line. Power ups: The Colour Bomb is created when you make a 3-step or more combo. When used in a combo, the Colour Bomb will remove all blocks of its colour. The Line Blast is created when you make a combo with 6 or more blocks. When used in a combo, it will remove a horizontal line. Be careful not to use this when you have animals on that line, or they will be lost! Only two power ups can be stored at any time, so if you create more than two powerups at the same time, the latest one will be stored. Black Blocks: The Black Blocks are only in your way. You cannot make combos with them, and the only way to get rid of them is by using line blasts. Black Blocks do not appear on the first levels, but get more and more common as you reach later levels. GAME CONTROLS Hold your finger on the screen and move it sideways to select which column to drop your next block in. Release the finger to drop. You can also switch place on the two blocks in the top block holder by clicking on it with your finger. STRATEGY Think before you drop your blocks, a long chain is worth a lot, both for the points and the powerups it will create. Work from the sides when possible. The score is increased for every level, but so is the amount of black blocks. This means that the first levels are more valuable than you might think. Look for chains of 3 steps or more to create the precious colour bombs. Use your line blasts wisely, and don’t just drop them off where they cannot be used to create combos. ------------------------------------------------------------ GAME HIGHLIGHTS 2 Game modes: Time Attack and Survival Local highscore list to keep track of your achievements OS 3.0 compatibale Multiple sound tracks Multiple block design to discover If you like this game visit King.com for hundreds of unique games and millions of players to meet and challenge.
